descriptor.name: A Plus A Pets
descriptor.short_desc: A Plus A Pets
descriptor.long_desc: A+a Pets' is the most trusted Pets care brands in Amazon

address.street: 215, Sagar ind. est., Prabhat ind. complex, Western express highway, Besides CNG Pump, Dahisar east, Mumbai-400068

descriptor.name: A+a Pets Dog Water Bottle, Pet Portable Water Bottle with 500ML Water Tank, Dog Food Storage, Poop Shovel & Garbage Bag, Leak Proof Button Design
A+a Pets' Harness and Leash Set, Colourful Combo in Rainbow for Cats and Dogs Rainbow
A+a Pets'Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness | Arthritis Paralyses Amputated Senior Older Dogs
A+a Pets' Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Toy with Feather Tail Play Toy for Cats, Puppies, and Small Animals
A+a Pets' Round Short Rope Traffic Leash | Heavy Duty | Good Grip for Large and Heavy Puller Dogs - 55 Cm
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets' Round Short Rope Traffic Leash | Heavy Duty | Good Grip for Large and Heavy Puller Dogs - 55 Cm
descriptor.long_desc: PACKAGE CONTENTS: The package includes one short dog lead.  PERFECT POSITION: This short Cotton rope dog leash is specially designed to keep your dog right by your side at crowded streets or high distraction environment. You can feel more security with the strength of this rope lead for long walks and outdoor activities with your dog. Also you can have full control of your energetic dog for dog training  KEEP YOUR DOG SAFE: Crafted from cotton rope with rubber stopper featuring a robust high-density anti-bite layer design, our dog leash ensures stability, strength, tear resistance, durability, and wear resistance for top-notch quality.  COMFORTABLE HANDLE WITH O-RING: Strong & comfortable handle to hold and provides grip strength. Metal O-ring is convenient for attaching poo-bag holder  PREMIUM QUALITY CLASP: Swivel clasp prevents the leash from twisting and dog getting tangled, giving your dog more freedom. In addition, the clasp adopts a new manufacturing process, which make it smooth and will not snag when using. Heavy-duty clasp makes our training leashes last longer than most ones. giving you peace of mind during training sessions

descriptor.name: A+a Pets' Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Toy with Retractable Pet Toy for Cats, Puppies, and Small Animals (Nemo White)
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets' Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Toy with Retractable Pet Toy for Cats, Puppies, and Small Animals (Nemo White)
descriptor.long_desc: LOVING DESIGN: A+a Pets' cat wand toy is crafted from fiber stick, feather Tail. The Tail toy dangles from the pole, making playtime more exciting and curious.  INTERACTIVE FUN: This Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Feather Tail Toy suitable for cats of all ages, Puppies, and small animals. It's designed to captivate your pet interest and improve their natural hunting instincts.  WIDE APPLICATION: If your cat often destroys the sofa furniture at home, this cat wand rod toy can be your first choice, the effect of physical exercise and intellectual training can achieve and keep your kitten healthy and energetic. This cat toy would be an ideal gift for your family or cat friend or your own cat.  BUSY CATS, HEALTHY CATS: This wand toy provides hours of exercise & self-amusement. It keeps your cat busy when you’re away. Burning off extra energy from your kitties. It will assist young kittens’ physical development and coordination  SAFE AND DURABLE: A+a Pets’ wand toys are made of high quality, safe, non-toxic, material, and the feather is from nature. The cat toy wand is made of high quality carbon fiber, so shaft is stronger. All interfaces are thickened design which are durable and flexible.  IMPROVE THE RELATIONSHIP: Affection and companionship are very important for cats. When you play with cat using our interactive cat toys, you can improve your relationship and build mutual trust.  A+a TIP: As with all new introductions in your pet's life, make sure to monitor it first a few times while your pet enjoys this toy. Happy and safe playtime!

descriptor.name: A+a Pets' Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Toy with Retractable Feather Cone Play Toy for Cats, Puppies, and Small Animals (Orange | Pink | Blue | Green)
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets' Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Toy with Retractable Feather Cone Play Toy for Cats, Puppies, and Small Animals (Orange | Pink | Blue | Green)
descriptor.long_desc: LOVING DESIGN: +A Pets' cat wand toy is crafted from a wooden stick and feather round. The feather dangles from the round, and the round is attached to the pole, making playtime more exciting and curious.  INTERACTIVE FUN: This Cat Wand Teaser Interactive Feather Cat round toy is suitable for cats of all ages, puppies, and small animals. It's designed to captivate your pet's interest and improve their natural hunting instincts.  WIDE APPLICATION: If your cat frequently damages your sofa furniture at home, this cat wand rod toy can be your top choice. It can effectively provide physical exercise and intellectual training, keeping your kitten healthy and energetic. This cat toy is an excellent gift for your family, cat-loving friends, or even your own cat  BUSY CATS, HEALTHY CATS: This wand toy provides hours of exercise and self-amusement, keeping your cat busy when you're away. It also assists in the physical development and coordination of young kittens.  SAFE AND DURABLE: A+A Pets' wands are made of high-quality wooden sticks, which are safe, non-toxic materials, and the feathers from nature.  IMPROVE THE RELATIONSHIP: Affection and companionship are very important for cats. When you play with a cat using our interactive cat toys, you can improve your relationship and build mutual trust.  A+a TIP: As with all new introductions in your pet's life, make sure to monitor it first a few times while your pet enjoys this toy. Happy and safe playtime!

descriptor.name: A+a Pets' Harness and Leash Set, Colourful Combo in Rainbow for Cats and Dogs Rainbow  - XS
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets' Harness and Leash Set, Colourful Combo in Rainbow for Cats and Dogs Rainbow  - XS
descriptor.long_desc: High Quality & Durable.This dog harness is made of high quality nylon which material is soft and will not harm pet's skin, durable and lightweight, suitable for long time wear.  Beautiful Colors Beautiful colors of rainbow design makes your pet more fashion and charming when walking outside. It is easy to see that your pet is unique.  Perfect Design Easy to put on and take off with the quick-release buckle. Adjustable straps for a better fit, eliminate the pulling pressure on your pet neck, and make your dog more comfortable when walking or training.  Harness & Leash Set-The dog harness comes with a leash. Suitable for all seasons, whether it's taking your pet for daily walking, jogging and running.  Adjustable Size- This dog harness and leash set is suitable for small breed Dogs, Puppies and Cats ."

descriptor.name: A+a Pets'Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness | Arthritis Paralyses Amputated Senior Older Dogs - XS-S
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets'Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness | Arthritis Paralyses Amputated Senior Older Dogs - XS-S
descriptor.long_desc: FULL BODY SUPPORT HARNESS: This is a simple and effective solution especially for elderly dogs, weak legs, amputated leg, paralysis, orthopedic injuries, hip dysplasia, Arthritis pain, recovering from surgery or other debilitating ailments. MAKE MOBILITY EASILY: Excellent to help your dog stand up, climb up and down the stairs, get in and out of vehicles, onto furniture, outside for a bathroom break, or to provide some assistance when taking a walk. EASY TO USE: Harness style with velcro, easy to wrap around your dog and affix it with buckle, soft yet strong handles for you to carry them with ease. STURDY, WATERPROOF & EASY TO CARRY: You can easily roll up this lift support harness, and place it in your bags THINK: No one likes to witness their dog in pain, imagine not being able to move due to old age or health issues. A+a Pets' Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness is designed to make your dogs' life mobile again, without you having to carry them.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness

descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets'Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness | Arthritis Paralyses Amputated Senior Older Dogs - XL-2XL
descriptor.long_desc: FULL BODY SUPPORT HARNESS: This is a simple and effective solution especially for elderly dogs, weak legs, amputated leg, paralysis, orthopedic injuries, hip dysplasia, Arthritis pain, recovering from surgery or other debilitating ailments. MAKE MOBILITY EASILY: Excellent to help your dog stand up, climb up and down the stairs, get in and out of vehicles, onto furniture, outside for a bathroom break, or to provide some assistance when taking a walk. EASY TO USE: Harness style with velcro, easy to wrap around your dog and affix it with buckle, soft yet strong handles for you to carry them with ease. STURDY, WATERPROOF & EASY TO CARRY: You can easily roll up this lift support harness, and place it in your bags THINK: No one likes to witness their dog in pain, imagine not being able to move due to old age or health issues. A+a Pets' Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness is designed to make your dogs' life mobile again, without you having to carry them.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Dog Lift Full Body Support Harness

descriptor.name: A+a Pets Dog Water Bottle, Pet Portable Water Bottle with 500ML Water Tank, Dog Food Storage, Poop Shovel & Garbage Bag, Leak Proof Button Design - 500 Millilitre - Green
descriptor.short_desc: A+a Pets Dog Water Bottle, Pet Portable Water Bottle with 500ML Water Tank, Dog Food Storage, Poop Shovel & Garbage Bag, Leak Proof Button Design - 500 Millilitre - Green
descriptor.long_desc: 4-in-1 Water Bottle-The pet water bottle is designed with three parts, the front part is a wide water bowl for your pets to drink water comfortably, the middle part is designed to contain 500mL of water, below it is part that contains food/kibbles and the bottom is to store waste bags (comes with a roll of 30 plastic bags). A small litter scoop is fixed around the bottle. Just pull out a bag from the bottom to cover the scoop and then use it to pick up dog poops when walking your dogs.  [Perfect for Walks] A drinking bottle, water bowl and waste bag container in one with a litter scoop, perfect for walking, hiking, camping, bike riding, travelling and going to dog park to help keep your dogs hydrated.  NO WASTAGE: this bottle is equipped with a large button water outlet switch, which can easily produce water in one second. Or press and hold the water button and stand the cup upright to make the remaining water flow back into the cup. No wastage!  LEAK PROOF: Silica gel seal ring and lock key design, make sure the pet water bottle doesn't leak at all.  DURABLE & SAFE: The portable dog water bottle made of high quality and Environment friendly ABS, a food grade material, makes sure your pet is completely safe when they use our dog water dispenser bottle. Easy to clean, each part can be separated and easily cleaned.  POTABLE & GOOD CAPACITY: 500ml capacity is enough for outdoor walking, hiking and traveling. Comes with a cord that can be easily carried around or placed in your backpack"

descriptor.name: Pothigai Enterprises
descriptor.short_desc: Pothigai Enterprises
descriptor.long_desc: Pothigai Enterprises specializes in the production of high-quality podi (spice blends) and soups. Our podi blends are made from premium ingredients, including roasted lentils, spices, and dried chilies, offering authentic flavors for South Indian cuisine. Our range of soups includes nutritious and flavorful options, catering to various tastes and dietary preferences. Explore Pothigai Enterprises for a delightful culinary experience rooted in tradition and quality.

descriptor.name: Homemade Pothigai Paruppu Sadha Podi | 100% Natural | No Artificial Color | No Artificial Flavor | 100Grams
descriptor.short_desc: Homemade Pothigai Paruppu Sadha Podi | 100% Natural | No Artificial Color | No Artificial Flavor | 100Grams
descriptor.long_desc: Pothigai Paruppu Sadha Podi" is a traditional South Indian spice blend that adds flavor to various dishes. This podi is typically made from roasted lentils (paruppu), along with a blend of aromatic spices like peppercorns, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, and dried red chilies. It's commonly used as a condiment or seasoning to enhance the taste of rice, idli, dosa, and other South Indian dishes. Key features of Pothigai Paruppu Sadha Podi: 1. **Ingredients:** Roasted lentils (paruppu), peppercorns, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, dried red chilies. 2. **Flavor Profile:** Spicy, aromatic, with a hint of earthiness from roasted lentils. 3. **Usage:** Sprinkle on rice, idli, dosa, or mix with ghee/oil as a flavorful accompaniment. 4. **Health Benefits:** Rich in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients from lentils and spices. 5. **Versatility:** Can be used as a dry rub for meats, in marinades, or added to soups and stews for added flavor depth. Overall, Pothigai Paruppu Sadha Podi is a versatile spice blend that brings the authentic flavors of South Indian cuisine to your meals, making it a must-have in any kitchen.

descriptor.name: Pothigai Garam Masala Powder: Pure and Natural, No Preservatives or Artificial Colors
descriptor.short_desc: Pothigai Garam Masala Powder: Pure and Natural, No Preservatives or Artificial Colors
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in the rich and aromatic flavors of Pothigai Garam Masala Powder, a blend of pure and natural spices crafted for culinary perfection. Our masala powder is free from preservatives and artificial colors, ensuring an authentic and wholesome experience in every dish.  Pothigai Garam Masala Powder is a harmonious fusion of handpicked spices, expertly ground to enhance the taste and aroma of your dishes. Whether you're preparing curries, biryanis, or stews, our masala powder adds a depth of flavor that's unparalleled, thanks to its pure and natural ingredients.  We take pride in offering a garam masala powder that is free from preservatives and artificial colors, preserving the essence and goodness of each spice. With Pothigai Garam Masala Powder, you can enjoy the true flavors of traditional Indian cuisine without any compromises.  Whether you're a home cook experimenting with new recipes or a seasoned chef creating signature dishes, Pothigai Garam Masala Powder is your essential spice blend. Elevate your cooking with the warmth and complexity of natural spices, and experience the magic of authentic flavors.  Key Features:  Pure and natural blend of spices for authentic flavor.  No preservatives or artificial colors.  100% natural ingredients.  Enhances the taste of various dishes effortlessly.
